articles.title: Lewis Hamilton says he feels 'smaller' and reveals other health concerns due to Mercedes car that is 'so bad' as Formula 1 star opens up ahead of Canadian Grand Prix
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says he feels 'smaller' and reveals other health concerns due to Mercedes car that is 'so bad' as Formula 1 star opens up ahead of Canadian Grand Prixtalksport.com
articles.content:
Lewis Hamilton has bizarrely said his Mercedes car is so bad that he may have shrunk due to bouncing issues that could be causing micro-concussions.
